name: Jumping Jacks
description: A full body warm-up exercise that improves cardio and coordination.
commonMistakes: Landing too hard, not using full range of motion.
steps: Stand upright with legs together, arms at sides.
Bend knees slightly and jump into the air.
As you jump, spread your legs to shoulder-width apart and raise your arms overhead.
Jump back to starting position and repeat.

name: Bodyweight Squat
description: A lower body strength movement targeting thighs and glutes.
commonMistakes: Letting knees cave inward, lifting heels.
steps: Lower hips back and down, keeping chest upright.
Go down until thighs are parallel to floor.
Push through heels to return to starting position.

name: Push-Ups
description: Upper body strength move focusing on chest, arms, and core.
steps: Start in a high plank position.
Lower your body keeping elbows close to your body.
Push back up to starting position.
